channel.title: Getting Started?
channel.description: Hey guys, im new to moparscape, and i havent really played many games in my past exept for fps, and i know nothing about pc's. I have downloaded moparscape but whenever i put an ip in the ip place andput in a name and password it says server down, and i have tried loads of servers and i really want to play. PLEASE HELP!!!!

item.title: Getting Started?
item.dc:creator: @Nwfd1025 Nwfd1025
item.description:
@Nwfd1025 wrote:

well you should look in the advertisement section to find a server. It might also help if you download hamachi.

Read full topic
